sentence.text: A xenograft model in which establishment of mitotic spindle orientation mice were injected with UBE2T knockdown human gastric cancer cells confirmed that suppression of UBE2T also decreased tumor formation and growth in vivo.
siRNA-mediated suppression of protein monoubiquitination inhibited gastric cancer cell proliferation and colony formation by promoting cell cycle arrest at G2/M phase and increasing apoptosis.
protein monoubiquitination was highly expressed in gastric tumors and gastric cancer cells.
